sql.query: select "tsptest"."employe"."nom" as "employeNom", "tsptest"."employe"."matricule", "tsptest"."tsp"."nom" as "tspNom", "tsptest"."modele_tsp"."img", "tsptest"."accessoire_affectations"."date_crea", "tsptest"."modele_tsp"."id_modele" from "tsptest"."accessoire_affectations" full outer join "tsptest"."employe" on "tsptest"."employe"."matricule" = "tsptest"."accessoire_affectations"."user_crea" full outer join "tsptest"."tsp" on "tsptest"."tsp"."id_tsp" = "tsptest"."accessoire_affectations"."id_tsp" full outer join "tsptest"."modele_tsp" on "tsptest"."modele_tsp"."id_modele" = "tsp"."modele_id" where "tsptest"."accessoire_affectations"."id_accessoire" = ?
